Name: Mirror Drop
About the game: Mirror Drop is a psychedelic 3D puzzle game where you maneuver a reflective sphere in a world full of mirrors, over-saturated colors, and infinities. Each level contains three puzzles and a hidden exit, set against 100% raytraced alien geometry. 25 levels 3+ hours of content 3 save slots (auto-saves after each level)
Meta Title: Mirror Drop: May 18, 2018, Ian Lilley and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Mirror Drop? Check out the release date (May 18, 2018), developer insights from Ian Lilley, and a complete game summary.
